comment: aggregate function and group by with limit
query: select max(f_int),min(name) from t_user group by id,f_tinyint order by f_tinyint desc limit 20

plan.Original: select max(f_int),min(name) from t_user group by id,f_tinyint order by f_tinyint desc limit 20

Inputs.Aggregates: max(0) AS max(f_int), min(1) AS min(`name`), any_value(3) AS weight_string(f_tinyint)

Inputs.FieldQuery: select max(f_int), min(`name`), f_tinyint, weight_string(f_tinyint), id, weight_string(id) from t_user_0 where 1 != 1 group by id, f_tinyint, weight_string(id)
Inputs.Query: select max(f_int), min(`name`), f_tinyint, weight_string(f_tinyint), id, weight_string(id) from t_user group by id, f_tinyint, weight_string(id) order by f_tinyint desc, id asc limit :__upper_limit
